## Grading R code

Write a function to return the number 2.

```{webr}
#| caption: Sample Exercise 2
#| exercise: example_1
foo <- function () {
  return(4)
}
```

::: { .solution exercise="example_1" }

**Fully worked solution:**

```r
foo <- function () {       #<1>
  return(2)                #<2>
}
```
1. Define the function `foo`, and then,
2. Return the number 2.

:::
